  • public class MyDatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    this is a helper class which extends SQLiteOpenHelper class this helper class has some method to do some operation with sqlite database

        public long insertData(java.lang.String systol,
                       java.lang.String diastol,
                       java.lang.String blood_pressure_status,

                       java.lang.String date_value,
                       java.lang.String time_value,
                       java.lang.String comments)
        insert record into sqlite database
        Parameters:
        systol - systolic data
        diastol - disatolic data
        blood_pressure_status - blood_pressure_status will be showed
        pulse - pulse of user
        pulse_status - pulse_status of user
        date_value - on which data record is inserted
        time_value - on which time record is inserted
        comments - comment on each record
        Returns:
        return the id of where this record data is inserted in database

        Returns:

      • updateData

        public java.lang.Boolean updateData(java.lang.String id,
                                    java.lang.String sys,
                                    java.lang.String dias,

                                    java.lang.String pulse,

                                    java.lang.String date,
                                    java.lang.String time,
                                    java.lang.String comments)
        used to update data on database
        Parameters:
        id - id for each record
        sys - systolic data
        dias - disatolic data
        pressure_status - blood_pressure_status will be showed
        pulse - pulse of user
        pulse_status - pulse_status of user
        date - on which data record is inserted
        time - on which time record is inserted
        comments - comment on each record
        Returns:
        true if data is updated on that particular id or false if updateData is unsuccessful

        sys - systolic data
        dias - disatolic data
        pressure_status - blood_pressure_status will be showed
        pulse - pulse of user
        pulse_status - pulse_status of user
        date - on which data record is inserted
        time - on which time record is inserted
        comments - comment on each record
        Returns:
        true if record on that id on database is equal, false if not equal
